name: CREPPY HOUSE demo
description:
Can you survive a night at Creppy?

In this survival horror game, you have to hide from a scary monster that tracks your dreams. You have to listen to the sound and think quickly!

Alone, just a camera, the only light you have ...

This is an early demo and is not finished yet! Some sounds in the game are just placeholders and do not belong to me! Please leave a feedback in the comments! I want to know how you think about the game. If this demo succeeds, I am working on a full version of the game!

Maybe a mobile port ...

@GerBGames
